title: Assess the validity of the statement about reform

content.question: “American reform movements between 1820 and 1860 reflected both optimistic and pessimistic views of human nature and society” Assess the validity of this statement in reference to reform movements in THREE of the following areas. Education Temperance Women’s Rights Utopian experiments Penal institutions
